name: Elemental Weapon
descricao:
A nonmagical weapon you touch becomes a magic weapon. For the duration, the weapon has a +1 bonus to attack rolls and deals an extra 1d4 elemental damage.
	**Enhance Spell** Spending 7000 extra mana, the bonus attack rolls increases to +2 and the extra damage increases to 2d4. Spending 50000 extra mana (i.e. 58400 MP), the bonus attack rolls increases +3 and the extra damage increases to 4d4.
